data.text: @LongCovidKids @SGriffin_Lab @mvankerkhove @davidnabarro @WHO @alitwy @SAPHNAsharonOBE @UKHSA @UKSepsisTrust @iHealthVisiting @CAMHSNetwork @PandasPans @pandemicaid_net Who is funding this research? Long covid symptoms seem to be exactly the same as anxiety in children. How do you know these symptoms aren’t anxiety or stress related? Our poor children have suffered enough, now the media are scaring them again.

@LongCovidKids @mvankerkhove @davidnabarro @WHO @SGriffin_Lab @alitwy @SAPHNAsharonOBE @UKHSA @UKSepsisTrust @iHealthVisiting @CAMHSNetwork @PandasPans @pandemicaid_net Covid is gone now, but because your not relevant, I can see your struggling with that, I’ll give ya a medal https://t.co/SmLUpjiPtO

⬆️ We need  a clear public awareness campaign that shifts the messaging from “kids are fine” to - some children will get Long Covid & this is how you can reduce risk. 

Protection. Prevention. Prepare 

@mvankerkhove @davidnabarro @WHO 

#LongCovidKids https://t.co/sQ1KPuk440
@LongCovidKids @Dr2NisreenAlwan @jneill I must be mistaken. I thought I was assured long ago that children didn’t get the Virus.
